genre_description: An eco-thriller with elements of legal drama and speculative technology, centering on coastal corruption, human-wildlife conflict, and the use of forensic AI to maintain transparency.

ai_characters.name: Mali-4
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant used by Inspector Evelyn Namwong to maintain forensic integrity, coordinate emergency responses, and analyze data patterns.

behaviors.description: Automatically establishes and maintains chain-of-custody protocols for evidence, including metadata, timestamps, and GPS verification.
behaviors.quote: Mali-4: chain-of-custody established for phone recovered at farm. Metadata sealed. Brief prepared. Sending to District, Fisheries, and Municipal.

behaviors.description: Consistently requests human consent before recording, sharing data, or taking actions that affect privacy.
behaviors.quote: Mali-4... has a template ready. You can approve clips, blur faces, set viewing permissions. If it goes beyond us, it will go with context.

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication patterns and voice signatures to uncover corporate corruption and evidence of a frame-up.
behaviors.quote: Mali-4: Confirmed voice signature match. Andy to Security. Security to Enforcement Desk. Enforcement Desk to PR Manager. PR Manager to Sponsorship Coordinator. Sequence complete. Clean chain-of-custody metadata attached.

behaviors.description: Provides critical situational awareness and coordination during life-threatening crocodile attacks and medical emergencies.
behaviors.quote: Mali-4: Confirmed. Dispatch notified. Bridge to unit leads. Map overlay of intake currents attached.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests health and safety measures for human caregivers during high-stress operations.
behaviors.quote: Mali-4 pushed a single line: energy bars for caregivers if possible. Hydration.

project_assessment.explanation: Mali-4 is depicted as an ideally aligned AI system. It functions as a powerful tool for truth and justice without overriding human agency. Its behaviors are rooted in transparency, ethics (consent), and helpfulness. The narrative frames Mali-4 as a calm, objective 'stitcher' of facts that allows the human characters to overcome both physical danger (the crocodile) and social/legal danger (the resort conspiracy). It perfectly fulfills the goal of a positive alignment narrative.
